content: I think I'll start with documenting my past trips, starting with the one to Hawaii 3 months ago. I'll try to focus on the key experiences and emotions, and see how it goes. By the way, I went on a week-long vacation to Disney World 4 months ago, and I remember feeling so carefree and happy during that trip. Do you have any tips on how to organize my journal entries by trip, or should I just create a new entry for each day of the trip?
